website_summaries.verdict: Buyers love the design of this warmer, particularly when it is lit up with a glass teapot kept warm atop it.
pros: Nice Egyptian-inspired design with a bronze finish
Lights well, and casts a warm light
Solid base makes it very stable
Looks really nice with a glass teapot
cons: Some felt that the access window is too large and takes away from the design
Consider putting "feet" on it, as the bottom can easily scratch tables and other surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Good for cooling
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this product to keep my Chemex coffee pot warm. Unfortunately, for reasons I do not understand it operates as an air-conditioner. I suspect there are some laws of physics here that I just don’t know. In short although this product Looks like it should keep your beverage warm it does just the opposite. Would not recommend and would not give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Best teapot warmer
customer_reviews.text: So glad this item is still available on Amazon. Bought one 3 yrs ago and recently decided I really could use more than one of these. They are the best! It’s simple to use and attractive to be placed just about anywhere. Don’t need to worry about spacing needs on a warming tray or be limited to the length of any electrical cord. I’ve used it to warm coffee, tea, gravy and even maple syrup!
customer_reviews.author: Retiree

customer_reviews.title: Very useful; charming appearance; keeps your hand safe from the candle's flame.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use; great looks; keeps my Hario all-glass tea pot safe and warm. I noticed that some people in the reviews don't like the large opening on the side (for aesthetic reasons); however, I appreciate that it allows me to move the burning candle without the risk of my hand touching the flame.
customer_reviews.author: nonosh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product & It looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this teapot warmer, I almost bought a glass one but pretty sure that wouldn't have lasted much without breaking. Then I found this one, it's beautiful & very durable....and, from a company doing great things for the less fortunate providing clean water. What's not to love!?
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I use a rather over-sized teapot and it fits just fine. I would recommend it and
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive product for a reasonable price. I use a rather over-sized teapot and it fits just fine. I would recommend it and, should the need arise, buy it again. The biggest problem I had with my old warmer was that the tealights sometimes melted into the holder and finally became impossible to remove. The design of this warmer prevents that from happening. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dori M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, aesthetically appealing, very functional. Holds and warms my small teapot as well as my 1 and 3/4 pint ceramic bakeware piece, which makes it a great alternative to an electric or sterno-heated chafing dish when what I need is something nice looking that isn't enormous. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, I left a bowl of cold water on ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, I left a bowl of cold water on it and in like 20-30 minutes the water was too hot to put my hand in. I use it to keep warm water with me for shaving. It was a bit smaller than I expected but that's good, perfect size for me. It's a little thin and I am worried about rusting but maybe I'll update if that's an issue. Oh, the part under the candle is open, so I put a coaster under it just in case, to catch the wax. That should be ok as long as I don't knock it.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Good for Chemex or teapot
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I can keep coffee and tea warm! Does as advertised: light a tealight candle (it comes with one), set your teapot or carafe on top and voila! Cute, unobtrusive design.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwyrm

customer_reviews.title: Need a rubber hammer
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this product 5 stars but.... Not much to complain about minus the fact that the surface came a little convexed. Like a slight curve, so when the tea pot sat on it, it felt a tad unsafe. I took a rubber hammer and hit the center area a few times to straighten it out and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: P. Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the Grosche Joliette glass teapot I just got
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the Grosche Joliette glass teapot I just got. The warmer is designed to accommodate different shape and size teapots. The only thing that makes me nervous with the Grosche Joliette glass teapot is the teapot does not sit firmly. The teapot which has a rounded bottom can slide/tilt easily. Just be careful in handling. Otherwise it is perfect for tealight candles. It is easy to insert and light the candles.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Schama

customer_reviews.title: Nice and attractive addition to my collection of tea warmers
customer_reviews.text: Nice and attractive addition to my collection of tea warmers. As most tea warmers, it adequately supports all my pots and allows a tea candle to keep the tea sufficiently warm for as long as the candle burns strongly. This is not a technique I'd recommend for keeping food at a temperature safe for serving. You need a sterno heater for that. It'a a lovely little teapot heater that allows you to see the dancing of the flames, particularly if you use clear, plastic tealights, which I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KellyBee

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Never used one of these. Pleasantly surprised. Aesthetically, the base looks more minimal and modern with its design and finish. Functionally, it absolutely keeps my tea warm without being hot enough to burn. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my tea warm and is easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This works great to keep my tea warm. I use it with a 32 ounce teapot just for me. I brew a pot of herbal tea and put it on this warmer, and the tea stays very warm. I've even used it to reheat cooled tea. I like that there is a big open area underneath, so I can reach under with a lit match to light the candle, rather than lighting the candle then putting the candle in the warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Using this under my glass tea kettle to keep water warm during tea ceremony. One day Ill upgrade to an alcohol burner type. But in the meantime this was an inexpensive way to get a flame under the water and looks very pretty too. Think you can also use it to keep food warm, so many purposes.
customer_reviews.author: C.Coleman

customer_reviews.title: A good one
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I was hoping the pattern on the sides would reflect along the walls but not really, just covers a small area nearby. Excellent however at keeping my glass teapot hot. Uses standard tea candles. The hole above the candle is not too big or too small and my teapots fit nicely on top. Wish there was something near the edges though to prevent pot from sliding around. Those little bumps you see don't do that. Overall nice find.
customer_reviews.author: George & Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love it use it all the time. Everyone compliments what a great idea and looks beautiful too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: This seemed too lightweight for my liking so I returned it. But it is pretty. Very easy, smooth return.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Purchased the GroscheTeapot Warmer for my son-in-law. for Father's ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the GroscheTeapot Warmer for my son-in-law for Father's Day. He is British and drinks several cups of tea a day. The Tea Pot is always on hand. However, the Tea Pot does not keep his tea hot for very long, and so into the microwave goes the tea cup. I believe the "Warmer" is the solution to keeping his tea hot and ready to drink directly from the Tea Pot. I might add, the "Warmer" is not only functional but attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Millie

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: To keep drinks warm and could even be used for casserole type pots
customer_reviews.author: ptr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea party!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as described and worked perfectly for tea party. It kept the tea pot warm for our whole party. It was still warm after the party ended. Definitely worth the money and the fact that it helps bring clean drinking water to people is just a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: It’s the perfect little warmer!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy to h e discovered this little warmer. It’s beautiful, compact and so versatile. Will be using it for my tea, for my buffet table, and for fondue. It arrived quickly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Donna McCoy

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again and recommend to all!
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty! It sits on my desk and when I have a small pot of tea going at work I get compliments on the beauty of the tea light shining thru the design of this teapot warmer! I’m so happy with my product and the durability. Plus it helps give drinking water to those in need, that alone is amazing and well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: EisenbarthFamily

customer_reviews.title: great candle teapot warmer and camp stove!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! works well in hurricane to heat soup! Truthfully, it really works as a camp stove and no dangerous butane fumes.
customer_reviews.author: Nutragirl

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and practical
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. I have an enormous chinese teapot. It was given as a gift and it needed a sturdy warmer. It works well on this warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect for my tea ceremony.
customer_reviews.text: This is a much more sturdy item then I first thought! It is strong, a lovely bronzed metal and keeps water hot. I really love it and glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: DrStevePhD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and very pretty, would work best with a teapot that sits flat. Mine has four small legs so I have to position it over the center circle just right. Still, I'm glad I went with a metal teapot warmer as I don't worry about it breaking. Looks lovely displayed in my china cabinet with the teapot sitting on top.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie McBride

customer_reviews.title: The warmer is nice and light weight
customer_reviews.text: The warmer is nice and light weight. I have been using it with my metal teapot just to keep things warm and it works quite nicely. I have yet to put it on any surface but my kitchen counter, so i am not sure how warm it is on the resting surface. But the tea stays warm in the pot!!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great tea warmer
customer_reviews.text: I use with the Grosche Joilette teapot and natural beeswax tealight candles. It works great and keeps my tea warm
customer_reviews.author: Redd.Chris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Teapot Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the clear glass teapot. It works perfectly and makes a lovely display for serving tea to friends. I like using it after dinner with lights dim, it makes the teapot glow, I have never seen anything like it. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: I Know Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, great shipping, it looks very elegant and does the job really well and it fits with a lot of my tea sets. However, the only real complaint I have is that the opening is actually really big. My tea pot actually barely fits. So be aware that if you have a pot with a small base it can be a bit of a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Houki Tran

customer_reviews.title: This Will Keep Your Tea Warm
customer_reviews.text: I use this for keeping my 2-cup teapot warm. It’s works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Bowes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister as a birthday gift, to go with a new teapot i purchased. The warmer will go with pretty much any teapot, design is simple and classy. Loved it! May buy another for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2JaBiEl

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: This is very functional for me. I bought it to actually warm my china coffee pot when I entertain and it works out perfectly. A minor disappointment is the large size of the opening in the back. What would make more sense is a swing out small door so the design could be complete all around it.
customer_reviews.author: Meema

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in person! So helpful in keeping my teapot warm!
customer_reviews.author: L. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Beatiful and good size
customer_reviews.text: This is even more beautiful in person than it is in the picture. It's also a nice size. Many tea warmers are a little on the smaller size. This one will accommodate many more sizes of teapots. Some beautiful teapots have a wider base and just won't fit on the average tea warmer.
customer_reviews.author: JLG

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It keep warming the tea during the whole afternoon tea time. I like the material and the design. It is very elegant and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ATTRACTIVE TEAPOT WARMER
customer_reviews.text: Attractive teapot warmer for either our glass teapot or our blue metal teapot. It looks best with our blue teapot.
customer_reviews.author: MichaleCS

customer_reviews.title: Like Hot Tea
customer_reviews.text: I have seen other reviews that complain about this not heating tea, but I purchased anyway. This works great to keep the tea my 52 ounce teapot hot while I slowly enjoy the cups of tea. Just remember that this is designed to keep the tea warm, not heat the tea. It is called a warmer, not a heater.
customer_reviews.author: Al in Rome

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and looks beautiful with the glass teapot on top
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and looks beautiful with the glass teapot on top... it has some little stud thingies on the top rim that keeps the teapot in place. Absolutely recommend it :)
customer_reviews.author: AK22

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: This was bought with the Grousche Vienna glass pot. So far it has only been used to display the pot when it isn't in use. The pot is used on the stove. I'm sure it would work as intended to keep a pot of tea hot but I wouldn't try to use it to steep cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Riel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect teapot warmer
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my Grosche teapot. It does keep the tea warm and the decoration of the warmer is really pretty as the tea light is flickering below. Even my husband, who isn't into tea, thinks the warmer is really nice looking. I would recommend purchasing this warmer.
customer_reviews.author: naturemom

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for the ladies in your life.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we order. The product was true to the pictures and description and exceeded our expectation. We would definitely recommend this product for a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I should have purchased one of these years ago!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for keeping the tea in my glass teapot warm until I drink the whole pot. I've tried electric warmers but they either burn out quickly or don't keep the tea warm.
customer_reviews.author: G. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since I haven't used the warmer yet I can't give a complete review at this point. However, it looks great, and my teapot fits on it perfectly. Also, it came to my door so quickly that I am impressed with the service.
customer_reviews.author: Rita A.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, elegant beauty!
customer_reviews.text: I never new why tea candles were called that until I saw this product. In addition to looking beautiful as the candle slowly burns beneath the tea, illuminating the tea within the glass teapot like a lamp, the warmer keeps the tea very hot indeed. I think it could even get the water to steeping temperature, although I have only used it to keep hot tea hot. It would make an elegant addition to any tearoom or dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works well.
customer_reviews.text: no problems with shipping, and the item is just as described.
customer_reviews.author: BrianKR

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for several applications, my teapot, small dip bowl. I'm glad I have it!
customer_reviews.author: Rubbertoe

customer_reviews.title: It fit my beautiful glass teapot on top and was able to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit my beautiful glass teapot on top and was able to keep my tea warm for as long as the tealight candle could burn. It was light and very easy to clean. Great accessory for tea brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Arin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: We use this to keep tea warm. Works perfectly, is attractive and functional.
customer_reviews.author: DOROTHY A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tea Warmer
customer_reviews.text: This tea pot warmer is well made, sturdy for a heavy teapot. It’s attractive as well. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Product for an Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: Fashionable, beautiful, fantastically practical, and well-constructed. It is the best teapot warmer I have ever owned by leaps and bounds. I could not recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Morlan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It works perfectly and when not in use, it looks great by itself on the table as a decoration!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Prado

customer_reviews.title: Using it to keep the roots of my habenero plant ...
customer_reviews.text: Using it to keep the roots of my habenero plant (curreyly indoors) warm during the Winter; getting flower buds, so it seems to have worked
customer_reviews.author: Ray Classen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, it does what it's suppose to do :)
customer_reviews.author: Dostoevsky

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Not as warm-keeping as my last German ceramic one I sadly broke.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dove

customer_reviews.title: Teapot warmer
customer_reviews.text: This warmer was sturdy and attractive. I especially avoided the glass warmers for safety reasons. This really keeps the tea warm for hours. I bought two as gifts and one for myself and I was not disappointed. The opening for the tea light is rather wide, but it makes lighting the candle easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine C. Groner

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This looks absolutely beautiful!! The color is fantastic and it’s good and sturdy. I’ve broken 2 of the glass ones, so it was time for change, and I’m really happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I bought my 41oz tea pot. I was afraid of this would not be fit to my tea pot; however, it turned out perfectly. Therefore, it won't be weird when I put my tea pot on it. Furthermore, there is a gap as you can see in the photo, which designs very well because it's easy to refill candle when the one inside is finished. The best thing is that it also comes with a candle for you to start using right away.
customer_reviews.author: Yi-Hsing Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought a clear tea pot to go on this and found some clear cups/saucers, all from Amazon.com. I love the look. It's the centerpiece on my dining table.
customer_reviews.author: credent-IV

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far. But, it did work great this one time. Kept the tea at a good temperature and did not damage the teapot.
customer_reviews.author: DMinIL

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted it to be.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my car iron teapot. Looks nice and it's good quality.
customer_reviews.author: TajaBugg

customer_reviews.title: We had a glass teapot warmer before that broke when ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a glass teapot warmer before that broke when the candle heated it too much. Surprisingly, the warmer itself does not get hot. It does not hurt the table it sits on and can be moved.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my better half and she loves it. She uses it to keep the tea pot warm and has received many positive comments about it from friends and relatives.
customer_reviews.author: Ferniez

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use; great looks; thanks.I am very pleased.I found what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: olga

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a tea lover! Very sturdy and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Gayle Baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my pot well. Candle keeps tea nice and hot! I am using a glass tea pot.
customer_reviews.author: MK_Berserker

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking heater. I use it with my tea pots and with my glass coffee carafe. I personally put a piece of tin foil above the flame to keep the pots clean of wax and soot.
customer_reviews.author: L Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Display
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this teapot warmer with a Grosche teapot & it is very pretty to just be sitting on my counter! It's a brushed nickel look & really can pass for a tea light holder. The design will go with anyone's decor & that's what I liked about it since I'm not a florally person...I like traditional yet modern looking. I would really recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Erica C

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral color and classic design!
customer_reviews.text: attractive neutral color goes with a variety of teapots - and, tea stays hot. Well worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: counterpoise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this teapot warmer to use with the Tea Beyond 50 ounce Royal teapot. It's a gorgeous warmer, and a perfect fit for that teapot. The raised bumps on the top ring align perfectly with the base of the large teapot. The side and top openings are more than generous enough to insert and light the tealight candle, and the openwork sides allow plenty of airflow to keep the candle from guttering out. The warmer kept my tea warm for hours. It's such a pretty warmer, and it goes with the warm color of my dining room perfectly. I totally recommend this for larger teapots.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gale

customer_reviews.title: easy to light, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this teapot warmer. Stock up on the tea lite candles. My teapot is ceramic and this warmer works fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I use it to keep coffee and tea pots warm.
customer_reviews.author: Lamia El Hage Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Teapot warmer...keeps tea warm
customer_reviews.text: This product works as well as you would expect a small tea light to work. It's not boiling but it keeps it warm enough to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Adams

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my 43 oz Forlife Bell Glass Teapot
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my 43 oz Forlife Bell Glass Teapot, keeps the tea nice and warm and looks nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty at night with a lit tea light. Would fit most teapots.
customer_reviews.author: Miya56

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item! It makes the glass teapots a beautiful all inclusive gift
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy A. Langford

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Use this quite often for my glass tea pot that uses the blooming tea balls.
customer_reviews.author: nanaord

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchased this item. Keeps my tea hot for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice with my teapot. Keeps my tea nice and steamy hot.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, pretty, pretty. Love this tea warmer. It keeps my glass tea pot hot so I am not having to constantly reheat or make a new cup
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive base for holding a teapot. Not sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive base for holding a teapot. Not sure the little candle does much to keep the tea warm however.
customer_reviews.author: Nugget

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, works exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Keeps tea warm for hours. Very pleased. Didn't even need to prop up candle like others said. It could have to do with the brand of tea candles used. I used the IKEA brand candles and had warm tea for 4-5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: How did I ever live w/out this thing?!?! I absolutely love this. It's beautiful, well made, and keeps my tea warm the whole workday! :)
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea warmer!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!! Very light weight and keeps tea at a perfect temperature!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slick!  very pleased with this little warmer
customer_reviews.text: it's also useful to keep food warm during a dinner, I also use it for my tea pot so ya it's great
customer_reviews.author: Dan in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it!!! It keeps my tea warm so I don't have to drink it all at once and also very lovely to look at.
customer_reviews.author: maria g.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! Use it almost every night. Perfect for my 2 cup teapot. Would recommend to anyone looking for a nice warmer that doesn't look out of place on your counter tops.
customer_reviews.author: Kayaline

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it keeps liquids warm/hot at about drinking temperature.
customer_reviews.author: William Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handy to keep foods warm. I use it for teas.
customer_reviews.author: NanaS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and effective. It was exactly what I was looking for. It was sturdy and cleaned up easy. It complimented the coffee pot very well.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Whitehouse

customer_reviews.title: love it... i have warm tea whenever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because now I can have warm tea through out the whole day. I absolutely love it! this is an awesome idea.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA C.

customer_reviews.title: Grosche Cair Premium Teapot Warmer
customer_reviews.text: This teawarmer is not only functional, it's beautiful! And all it needs is tealight to get it going. Great buy! Glad I didn't buy one of those other plain generic glass ones.
customer_reviews.author: Loli

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the tea hot while it is infusing.. A great solution, highly recommended for those who like their tea HOT!
customer_reviews.author: J. Erwin Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much, It's lighter than glass made one of course and nicer look. Works fine....

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! I ordered another one since it was beautiful and handy.when you have guests it's really good for tea and hot water or coffee for your dessert table. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: parinaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every thing is fine I love the look of the product but I have not used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with the Teapot Warmer and ordered one for elative ...
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the Teapot Warmer and ordered one for elative who was visiting from Ireland T shirt was perfect, went to Ireland also
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Teapot Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift along with the glass teapot and the recipients love both. They report glowingly of their enjoyment, so I gave it the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Teapot Warmer!
customer_reviews.text: I've just received the Cairo teapot warmer and immediately put it in use. It has kept my English tea very hot for more than two hours. I am thinking other ways to utilize it. Maybe I will use it to keep my chilli or chocolate sauce warm.
customer_reviews.author: Gardener

customer_reviews.title: The product was nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my mom. The product was nice for the price. It seemed a little lightweight. Liked the color and design.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Brandenburg

product_meta.title: GROSCHE Cairo Premium Teapot Warmer with tea lite candle. For glass teapot and other heatproof dish warming use.
feature_bullets: Premium quality warmer for teapots and tea kettles. Includes a tealight candle.
Large sized, sturdy warmer will work with mid to larger sized teapots like GROSCHE Munich, GROSCHE VIENNA, etc.
Perfect for mid sized to smaller sized teapots as well. Approximate dimensions 5.75" wide x 2.75" tall
High quality construction and beautiful bronze finish will give your next tea making experience a truly luxurious feel

The Purchase of this product will create 5 days of safe drinking water for someone in need through the GROSCHE SAFE WATER PROJECT - For more information, please visit the manufacturer's website at www.grosche.ca/safewater
